content.text: Почтовые ящики - это удобный и быстрый способ отправки почты между игроками на сервере. Письма, помещённые в почтовый ящик немедленно отправляются в почтовый ящик получателя.

Any player wishing to join the mailing network need only place a Mailbox down in the world. Usually, somewhere easily accessible and near their home is preferred. Letters may be simply notes getting sent between players, although it is a trivial matter to include several items in a mail package. These items will remain safely ensconced within the recipient's mailbox until such a time when the owner of the mailbox removes the items and opens the package.
Mailboxes can be set to private, which will prevent other players from seeing what is inside a mailbox in addition to preventing them from breaking them.
